source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_SEQ_00<tab>789th Order Dustman Bo Zu wants his dinner, but he'll be damned if he's going to work for it.
target: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_SEQ_00<tab>第789洞穴団の採掘地のダストマン789 ボ・ズは、不満なことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_SEQ_01<tab>The labor<var 1F /var>averse Bo Zu has caught word of generous meals being distributed by Zo Ga to those industrious kobolds who have earned the fugleman's favor, and has concluded that the 789th is equally deserving of gustatory gratification despite their decided lack of productivity. Head to Iron Lake and appropriate three lavish lunchpots so that Bo Zu and his friends can feast like their hard<var 1F /var>working peers for a day.
target: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_SEQ_01<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ズは、評価の高いコボルド族だけに、弁当が支給されているのが許せないようだ。冒険者に、支給された<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E896301 /var>を奪ってきてほしいと依頼してきた。アイアンレイクで「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E896301 /var>」を3個入手しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_SEQ_02<tab>You have managed to secure three piping hot lunchpots. Deliver the feast to the 789th Order Dig in hopes that it will sate the stomach of the slavering Bo Zu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E896301 /var>を入手した。第789洞穴団の採掘地の「ダストマン789 ボ・ズ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E896301 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_SEQ_03<tab>Bo Zu revels in the fruits of your success, though any hopes that the dustman has learned a lesson about the value of hard work are promptly dashed when he shamelessly expresses his eagerness to impose upon you similarly again. You can only hope that the idle<var 1F /var>handed kobold's stomach remains sated for the foreseeable future.
target: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_SEQ_03<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ズに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E896301 /var>を渡すと、彼は大喜びした。どうやら、コボルド族にとっては、とても豪華な弁当のようだ。働かずに食べる飯は、とびきり美味いらしい……。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_TODO_00<tab>Acquire lavish lunchpots from Iron Lake.
target: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_TODO_00<tab>アイアンレイクで<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E896301 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_TODO_01<tab>Deliver lavish lunchpots to 789th Order Dustman Bo Zu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_TODO_01<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ズに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E896301 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_000<tab>The unfairness─injustice, iniquity, unfairness of it all!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_000はぁ……ハラが減ったーど。
しかーも　ハラペコのオナカーが　よけいに減るよーな
ムシャクシャすることーが　あるんだーど！

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_001<tab>While the 789th goes famished─starving, hungry, famished─Zo Ga and his cronies feast! Feast on lunchpots packed, yes, so packed with tasty treats that a single one could feed our entire dig for a week.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_001なんでーも　仕事のできーる洞穴団の連中は
仕事中に　弁当がもらえるらしいんだーど！？
ヒイキだーど！　サベツだーど！　ゆるせないーど！

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_002<tab>Should Zo Ga and his hardworking cronies get all the rewards? No, no, a hundred times no! Yes, our tummies are rumbling─grumbling, mumbling, rumbling─as much as theirs!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_002いったーい　どんな弁当がでるんだーど……？
……ううう……ソウゾウしただけーで
ハラの虫が　鳴るーど……。

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_003<tab>Why, I have a notion─a thought, a mind, a notion─to walk right over to Iron Lake and snatch one or three for myself. But walking is hard work. Yes, yes, and your legs are so much <var 08 E4E94804 ((stronger)) ((longer)) /var> than mine...
target:
TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_003オイーラのために　「アイアンレイク」に行って
ヤツらの「」を　奪ってくるーど！
オイーラはここで　ヨダレをたらしーて　まってるーど！

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_004<tab>You will walk to Iron Lake and bring back three of Zo Ga's luscious lunchpots, yes? I am beside myself in drooling anticipation─dribbling, driveling, drooling anticipation!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_004オイーラのために　「アイアンレイク」に行って
ヤツらの「」を　奪ってくるーど！
オイーラはここで　ヨダレをたらしーて　まってるーど！

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_010<tab>Do I smell what I think I smell? Yes, yes, I believe I do!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_010「」を　早く持ってきてほしーど！
早くしないーと　オナカとセナカが　くっつくーど！

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_011<tab>Freshly plucked lava toad legs? Earthworms that still wriggle and squirm? This is more than a meal, it is a feast─a banquet, a spread, a feast for the senses!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_011おおおー！　これが「」！
ウマそうーに　ウネウネ動ーく　白ミミズだーど！！
エンリョなーく　いただくーど！　ありがとだーど！

source: TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_012<tab>Does sampling the delights of his peers inspire Bo Zu to work harder? No, no, never! Why would it, when I have <var 08 E4E94804 ((strong-legged)) ((long-legged)) /var> friends like you?
target:
TEXT_BANKOB102_01326_BOZU_000_012こんなゴウカな弁当が　もらえるなんーて
アイーツら　ズルーイど！　ヒイキだーど！　サベツだーど！
……それにしてーも　働かずに食べる弁当は　カクベツだーど！
